abstract: Michael McKie and Khalid Nelson, former New York City correction officers accused of orchestrating a scheme in which inmates at a Rikers Island juvenile detention center used threats, extortion and vicious beatings to keep other inmates in line, pleaded guilty to related crimes.
snippet: The former officers are accused of orchestrating a scheme in which inmates at a juvenile detention center used threats, extortion and vicious beatings to keep other inmates in line.
lead_paragraph: The former officers are accused of orchestrating a scheme in which inmates at a juvenile detention center used threats, extortion and vicious beatings to keep other inmates in line.

headline.main: Correction Officers Plead Guilty in Assault Case
headline.print_headline: Correction Officers Plead Guilty in Assault Case
headline.seo: Two Officers at Rikers Island Plead Guilty in Assault Case
